name: Cloud Storage
description: Secure and scalable cloud storage solution with flexible storage options.

name: Cloud Computing Instances
description: Powerful virtual machines for running applications and workloads in the cloud.

name: Cloud Database Service
description: Managed database service for storing and retrieving structured data in the cloud.

name: Cloud Content Delivery Network
description: Global network of servers for fast and reliable content delivery across the globe.

name: Cloud Monitoring Solution
description: Comprehensive monitoring and analytics platform for cloud infrastructure and applications.

name: Serverless Computing
description: Run applications without managing servers, scale automatically, and pay only for usage.

name: Cloud Data Warehousing
description: Efficiently analyze large volumes of data with a scalable and high-performance data warehouse.

name: Cloud Backup and Recovery
description: Automated backup and recovery solutions to protect critical data and applications.

name: Cloud AI Services
description: Harness the power of artificial intelligence with pre-built models and APIs for vision, speech, and language.

name: Cloud DevOps Tools
description: Collaborative development and operations tools for efficient software delivery in the cloud.

name: Cloud Object Storage
description: Scalable and durable storage for unstructured data with low latency access and high availability.

name: Cloud Load Balancer
description: Distribute incoming network traffic across multiple servers to improve application availability and performance.

name: Serverless Database
description: Fully managed, auto-scaling database service that removes the need for database administration.

name: Cloud Video Transcoding
description: Convert video files into various formats and resolutions for streaming and delivery across devices.

name: Cloud Identity and Access Management
description: Control access to cloud resources with centralized user management, permissions, and authentication.

name: Cloud Container Orchestration
description: Manage and automate the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

name: Cloud IoT Platform
description: Connect, manage, and analyze data from IoT devices securely and at scale in the cloud.

name: Cloud Server Backup
description: Automated backup and restore services for server instances, ensuring data protection and recovery.

name: Cloud CDN
description: Distribute content globally with low latency and high data transfer speeds using a content delivery network.

name: Cloud Machine Learning
description: Build and deploy machine learning models at scale using cloud-based infrastructure and services.
